QuizHistoryFile - Class in org.ingatan.data
Quiz history including a record for each time a quiz has been entered, the result, and how many questions were asked/skipped and also what libraries were included.

quizHistoryFile - Static variable in class org.ingatan.io.IOManager
File that contains the total overall score acheived so far, as well as records of all quizes that have been undertaken (dates, results, questions asked/skipped, and libraries used).

QuizManager - Class in org.ingatan.io

QuizWindow - Class in org.ingatan.component.quiztime
The quiz window shows one question at a time, provides a 'next question' button, and a panel showing statistics for the current quiz, such as the number of questions answered, remaining, the number of points awarded so far, the average grade of answers, etc.
